text: Aftermath is a lost 1914 American silent drama movie based on play of the same name by William Addison Hervey. It stars Owen Moore, Virginia Pearson and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== *Aftermath at IMDb.com Category:1914 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Aftermath (1914 movie)
